string.name: ro_perm_desc
string.value: Allows applications to read data from the IM content provider.

string.name: wo_perm_desc
string.value: Allows applications to write data to the IM content provider.

string.name: signout_all_confirm_message
string.value: Do you want to sign out all services?

string.name: confirm_delete_contact
string.value: The contact \"<xliff:g id="user">%1$s</xliff:g>\" will be deleted.

string.name: confirm_block_contact
string.value: The contact \"<xliff:g id="user">%1$s</xliff:g>\" will be blocked.

string.name: confirm_unblock_contact
string.value: The contact \"<xliff:g id="user">%1$s</xliff:g>\" will be unblocked.

string.name: signed_out_prompt
string.value: You have been signed out of <xliff:g id="account">%1$s</xliff:g>.

string.name: signed_out_prompt_with_error
string.value: You have been signed out of <xliff:g id="account">%1$s</xliff:g> because <xliff:g id="reason">%2$s</xliff:g>.

string.name: check_auto_sign_in
string.value: This option automatically signs you in every time you open this application. To disable the option, sign out, then clear the \"Sign me in automatically\" check box.

string.name: bg_data_prompt_message
string.value: <xliff:g id="provider">%1$s</xliff:g> needs background data to be enabled.

string.name: msg_sent_failed
string.value: This message could not be sent.

string.name: disconnected_warning
string.value: Lost connection to server. Messages will be sent when online.

string.name: contact_offline_warning
string.value: <xliff:g id="user">%1$s</xliff:g> is offline. Messages you send will be delivered when <xliff:g id="user">%1$s</xliff:g> comes online.

string.name: contact_not_in_list_warning
string.value: <xliff:g id="user">%1$s</xliff:g> is not in your Contact list.

string.name: input_contact_label
string.value: Email address of person you wish to invite:

string.name: invite_instruction
string.value: Type a name to add from Contacts.

string.name: notification_enabled_summary
string.value: Notify in status bar when IM arrives

string.name: notification_sound_summary
string.value: Also play ringtone when IM arrives

string.name: invitation_prompt
string.value: <xliff:g id="user">%1$s</xliff:g> has invited you to join a group chat.

string.name: invitation_sent_prompt
string.value: Invitation has been sent to <xliff:g id="user">%1$s</xliff:g>.

string.name: subscription_prompt
string.value: <xliff:g id="user">%1$s</xliff:g> has invited you to be on their Contact list.

string.name: approve_subscription_error
string.value: Unable to approve subscription from <xliff:g id="user">%1$s</xliff:g>. Please try again later.

string.name: decline_subscription_error
string.value: Unable to decline subscription from <xliff:g id="user">%1$s</xliff:g>. Please try again later.

string.name: group_chat_invite_notify_text
string.value: New group chat invitation from <xliff:g id="user">%s</xliff:g>

string.name: perm_desc
string.value: Allows applications to start IM service via intent.

string.name: login_service_failed
string.value: Unable to sign in to the <xliff:g id="service">%1$s</xliff:g> service. Please try again later.\n(Detail: <xliff:g id="description">%2$s</xliff:g>)

string.name: cant_connect_to_server
string.value: Cannot connect to server. Please check your connection.

string.name: contact_already_exist
string.value: "<xliff:g id="user">%1$s</xliff:g>" already exists in your Contact list.

string.name: contact_not_loaded
string.value: Please wait while your Contact list loads.

string.name: service_not_support
string.value: The server does not support this functionality.

string.name: invalid_password
string.value: The password you entered is not valid.

string.name: not_implemented
string.value: The server does not support this functionality.

string.name: version_not_supported
string.value: The server does not support the current version.

string.name: domain_not_supported
string.value: The server does not support forwarding to the domain.

string.name: unknown_user
string.value: The username you entered is not recognized.

string.name: recipient_blocked_the_user
string.value: Sorry, you are blocked by the user.

string.name: session_expired
string.value: The session has expired, please sign in again.

string.name: forced_logout
string.value: you have signed in from another client.

string.name: already_logged_in
string.value: you have already signed in from another client.

string.name: msisdn_error
string.value: Sorry, the phone number cannot be read from your SIM card. Please contact your operator for help.

string.name: not_signed_in
string.value: You are currently not signed in.

string.name: check_save_password
string.value: For your security, if your phone is lost or stolen, go to the Web site on your computer and change your password.

string.name: about_welcome
string.value: Gibberbot is a mobile instant messaging app that provides extra security features in order to stop people from snopping on your converstations and communications.\n\nThe app supports any chat service that uses the Jabber or XMPP protocol, such as Google GTalk or Jabber.org.

string.name: about_otr
string.value: \'Off-the-Record Messaging\' is a security system designed to enable privacy by mimicking the characteristics of a private conversation in the real world, including Encryption, Authentication, Deniability and Forward Secrecy.\n\nThe OTR-protocol is compatible with desktop chat clients such as Adium or Pidgin.

string.name: about_security
string.value: With Gibberbot, you can easily choose to encrypt conversations when messaging with others using a compatible app or program. You can also control how secure your connection to the chat server is. You\'ll always have the option to modify these settings in Account Settings.\n\nLet\'s get started!

string.name: setup_passphrase
string.value: Before you get started please choose a secure passphrase to protect your Gibberbot data from unjust access.

string.name: account_setup_error_validating
string.value: Gibberbot encountered an error while validating your username or password - please check them and try again.

string.name: account_setup_error_keypair
string.value: Gibberbot encountered an error while generating a keypair.

string.name: account_setup_error_server
string.value: Gibberbot encountered an error while connecting to the chat server - please check your configuration and try again.

string.name: account_setup_error_connectivity
string.value: Gibberbot encountered an error while connecting - please doublecheck your network connectivity and try again.

string.name: error_suspended_connection
string.value: Gibberbot has lost a connection to the network

string.name: error_reestablish_connection
string.value: Gibberbot is attempting to restablish a connection

string.name: otr_session_status_plaintext
string.value: Warning: This chat is NOT encrypted

string.name: otr_session_status_encrypted
string.value: This chat is secure but the identities of the participants have NOT been verified

string.name: otr_session_status_finished
string.value: Warning: chat encryption has been stopped.

string.name: otr_session_status_verified
string.value: This chat is secured and verified

string.name: account_wizard_setup_body
string.value: Enter your account ID to automatically configure Gibberbot for you chat service.\n\nIt probably looks like an email address - so yourname@gmail.com, or someone@jabber.org, for instance.

string.name: account_wizard_host_body
string.value: Please enter or edit your jabber/xmpp chat server hostname and port number (5222 is default).

string.name: account_wizard_ready_body
string.value: Gibberbot has been configured, and now it is time to connect to your service, and start chatting safely, securely and privately!
